title: 请问moz的链接在哪里？
author: MC神魔族
txt_content: 请问神秘时代4mod和神秘的扩展mod和植物魔法mod的链接可否发一下，和新的拔刀剑mod

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
拔刀剑https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/slashblade
神秘4curseforge地址https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/thaumcraft
神秘前置https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/baubles
神秘附属禁忌魔法https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/thaumic-exploration
神秘附属污秽魔法https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/forbidden-magic
神秘附属AE2拓展https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/thaumic-energistics
神秘附属库存扫描https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... -inventory-scanning
神秘附属节点追踪https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/thaumcraft-node-tracker
神秘附属神秘视界https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/thaumic-horizons
神秘附属神秘巫术学https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/witching-gadgets
神秘附属nei拓展https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/thaumcraft-nei-plugin
植物魔法https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/botania
